ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Poll results for eqbards
ygData.msgSnippet: SFA Meetings Hi my name is Minkin, and i have a Safe Fall Addiction, i can t help it, i have this problem with running slow, i need speed, i speed whereever i
ygData.messageBody:
SFA Meetings
Hi my name is Minkin, and i have a Safe Fall Addiction, i can't help it, i
have this problem with running slow, i need speed, i speed whereever i go
and i'm an avid jumper of cliffs *gasp from the crowd*

*crowd*:Hi Minkin... Welcome to SFA

ok im bored at work, and well i do have SFA, i love SF, and wish it would
cap even higher, those dreadland drops are really mean to go over!

Minkin/Rakka
Sol ro




>Are you able to hotkey Safe Fall? I use this skill just by falling off
>things, not by pressing a hot key for it.


Nah - you'll notice it also mentioned "can't live without" - my guess is, a
lot of Bards have problems with cliffs ;)

Talies


Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
